tool_description: Validates and structures raw order data to ensure all required fields are present and properly formatted for notification generation.

order_total.description: Total amount of the order including taxes and fees

currency.description: Three-letter currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

order_date.description: Date and time when the order was placed

error_messages: Invalid order_id: Order ID must be a non-empty string with alphanumeric characters only
Invalid customer_id: Customer ID must be a non-empty string
Invalid order_total: Order total must be a positive number greater than 0
Invalid currency: Currency must be a valid 3-letter ISO code (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)
Invalid order_date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)
usage: Provide order_id, customer_id, order_total, currency, and order_date. The tool validates all fields and returns a structured order object ready for notification processing.

is_valid.description: Whether the order data passed validation

validated_order.description: JSON string of the validated and structured order data

validation_errors.description: List of validation errors if any fields failed validation
